elements.name: Auftrag
elements.title: Indicate whether the respective task is correct or incorrect. Please correct the incorrect answers.

elements.name: question1
elements.title: You do not need to involve the organization team yet. You will only do this when you have a ready-made solution.

elements.name: question2
elements.title: Correction:
elements.correctAnswer: You call the entire organizational team together and note down the most critical points that need to be addressed immediately. You distribute these among the team.

elements.name: question3
elements.title: The schedule will be your best friend. The first thing you need to do is identify all critical deadlines and see what needs to be done earlier.

elements.name: question5
elements.title: You have the main responsibility for this event. This means that you have to do all the work on your own.

elements.name: question6
elements.title: Correction:
elements.correctAnswer: With additional support, it is easier to cope with the unforeseen.

elements.name: panel1
elements.title: Indicate whether the respective task is correct or incorrect. Please correct the incorrect answers.

elements.name: question7
elements.title: The request to the restaurant to reschedule can still wait.

elements.name: question8
elements.title: Correction:
elements.correctAnswer: This request must be made as soon as possible. The venue must be confirmed. If necessary, an alternative must be sought.

elements.name: question9
elements.title: The information to the invitees can be very brief - the announcement of the new date is not urgent.

elements.name: question10
elements.title: Correction:
elements.correctAnswer: All guests must be informed quickly of the change of date.
